nodes.bodyText: do we really need top-level shadow? I don't even think we shade anything in 3.2.x
mmh maybe we can remove it from this commit and keep it only in 3.3.x ? I think we need it for either benchmarks or reactor-tools, don't we?
yeah, I think this is indeed only needed for 3.3
